name: untanned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Untanned skin is not brown because it has not been in the sun: She had an incredibly beautiful face, completely untanned, and without any make-up. He yawned, stretching his tall, untanned body in the chilly air.
More examplesFewer examplesThere I was, untanned and inexperienced, a naive young boy from the land of hills and heather.With untanned skin, it takes time for the natural pigment to be triggered by the sun and to rise to the surface.When buying powder, choose a shade that is no more than two shades deeper than your untanned skin colour.
